HiddenText.Name: ACT/SAT/TOEFL or GED tests
HiddenText.OpenningText: Do I need to take the ACT/SAT/TOEFL or verify GED prior to applying?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Students are not required to take any standardized test for acceptance to the Academic Start level of the Pathway Program. However, all students must maintain a 'B' average to be considered for advancement into a degree program.
